name: Don't Melt (LD50)
description:
Winter is finally over and it’s starting to warm up. What a wonderful time, well, unless of course you’re made of snow…

Find ways to keep cool so you can survive

Controls Keyboard/Mouse
  • WSAD: Movement
  • Mouse: Camera ⚠
  • Escape: Pause/Settings
  • Space Bar: Jump
Controller ⚠ Camera ⚠ I intentionally put the camera the way it is because that is what I prefer. I get it, I’m weird. I was already aware of that which is why I added settings to change that in the pause menu (Escape or Start). You can stop commenting about the camera being “wrong” now. Tools
  • Engine: Unreal Engine 5 (Preview 2)
  • 3D Graphics: Blender
  • 2D Graphics: Photoshop

Source Code: https://bitbucket.org/asilvers-ludum-dare/ld50-dont-melt/src/main/
